scripts.seed: node -e "const https = require('https'); const http = require('http'); const url = process.env.SEED_URL || 'http://localhost:3000/seed'; console.log('Seeding database...'); const client = url.startsWith('https') ? https : http; const req = client.get(url, (res) => { let data = ''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => { console.log('Seed completed:', data); process.exit(0); }); }); req.on('error', (err) => { console.error('Seed failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"
